articles.title: Individual who travelled from India to SA tests positive for Covid-19 - News24

articles.description: Akani Simbine led South Africa's 4x100m quartet to a dramatic victory at the World Athletics Relays in Poland on Sunday.

articles.title: NASA's Mars helicopter has beamed back otherworldly collection of photos, video from first few flights - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Ingenuity has soared over the Martian surface four times. With each flight, the helicopter provides NASA with new photos of the red planet.
